inclusion.criterion: male adult patient with sickle cell anemia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: main complaint : sickle cell crisis pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: initial numeric pain intensity scale at presentation > 4
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: admission to the ED during working hours (amendment n°2-15/02/2010:from 8h to 20h)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: contraindication to anyone of the study drugs
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: complicated sickle cell crisis or admission requirement to an ICU
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: recent hospitalisation (< 10 days) for the same complaint
exclusion.label: unknown
